author: @nillionnetwork
text:
The builders on Nillion are shipping hard!

Check out the innovative apps built by 130+ devs, constantly pushing the boundaries of what's possible with privacy 👇 https://t.co/PbXWvmugld

author: @nillionnetwork
text:
Are your DNA, health data, and digital identity being weaponized against you?

It’s time to take it back.

Catch @daveasprey, the father of biohacking, take the stage with @kubla from @FulcraDynamics and @Vishakh from @MonadicDNA to talk privacy, Nillion, genomic data, and more! https://t.co/kjW15LgDR9

author: @nillionnetwork
text:
Privacy isn’t about hiding, it’s about taking control ⚔️

It means owning your data.
Choosing what to share.
And benefitting from what’s yours.

Because without privacy, there’s no freedom.
